bill.title: Tax Administration; Interest; Unpaid Penalties and Fines
bill.description: Imposes interest on unpaid penalties and fines. Requires filing with tax appeal court a notice of transfer upon transfer of appeal to tax appeal court. Amends rate of interest on amounts paid out of litigated claims fund. (SB2923 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM has scheduled a public hearing on 02-10-16 9:20AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 02-17-16 9:05AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Dela Cruz, Chun Oakland, English, Galuteria, Harimoto, Inouye, Riviere, Taniguchi, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2734) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-08-16.
Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Riviere). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 303) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to FIN, referral sheet 26
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Tuesday, 03-22-16 2:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Cachola, Cullen, DeCoite, Johanson, Jordan, Keohokalole, LoPresti, Lowen, Onishi, Tokioka, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Kobayashi, Pouha.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1488-16) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1; placed on the calendar for Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) McDermott, Oshiro, Thielen, Tupola excused (4).

Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Fukumoto Chang, Matsumoto, McDermott, Pouha, Tupola, Ward voting no (6) and Representative(s) Oshiro, Thielen excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 595).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
